content: this hat is designed to reach mid-ear additional instructions have been included for each hat size to make the hat reach the base-of-the-earlobe and slouch hat lengths finished project newborn hat 0 74 oz 21 g and 35 7 yds 32 7 m and adult medium hat 2 04 oz 58 g and 98 6 yds 90 5 m the simple seamless double_crochet hat pattern is made from the top-down in one-piece the hat is crocheted without slip stitches or chain stitches to give you a seamless finished hat > this pattern is available for free on > my blog which is monetized by ads if > you prefer an ad-free version of the > pattern it is available to purchase > right here on ravelry ♥ rhondda **instagram ** https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ **instagram reels ** https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ **tiktok ** https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet **pinterest ** https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ **youtube ** https //www youtube com/c/oombawkadesigncrochet sub_confirmation=1 **facebook ** https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ **newsletter ** https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2022 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
